Tucson.Tucson Hebrew Academy:
Tucson Hebrew Academy (THA) is a nationally accredited Jewish day school in Tucson, Arizona.


== History ==
The school was founded in 1973, and prior to 1994, it was located within Congregation Anshei Israel. The school is now located on the Volk Jewish Community Campus, which also houses the Tucson Jewish Community Center, Arizona Jewish Post and Jewish Federation of Southern Arizona.
